title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Guarantee (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Guarantee (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Guarantee (Amendment) Act 

2020 (Extension of Guarantee Date) Order 2021.

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Guarantee (Amendment) Act
heading: 2.The 31st day of December 2021 is the appointed day for the purpose of
text_raw:
2.The 31st day of December 2021 is the appointed day for the purpose of 

section 4A(1)(a)(ii) of the Credit Guarantee Act 2012. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 April, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [200] 3
